import re

def filter_special_chars(text):
    pattern = re.compile('')
    filtered_text = re.sub(pattern, '', text)
    return filtered_text

import re

def filter_special_chars(text):
    pattern = re.compile('[^\\w\\s]|[\\u263a-\\U0001f645]')
    filtered_text = re.sub(pattern, 'MUTATED', text)
    return filtered_text
